transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Hanji.
Executive: Vansh Industries se baat ho rahi hai?
Hanji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hanji hanji Vansh Industries mein baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Ye Murka baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Okay Murka very good afternoon. Main Aman baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, Faridabad Nagar. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya sir aap bataye.
Executive: Bas badhiya mam thank you so much. Actually kal na hamare paas aapka ek notification receive hua tha is complaint ke regarding ki aapko video meeting schedule karwani hai account manager se.
Customer: Haan actually kya hai na aapke IndiaMART ke jo apne login id password jo naam number aa raha hai jis person ka hamare yahan pe Kajal madam dekh rahi hai abhi aapka IndiaMART, theek hai? To wo contact karne ki try kar rahi hai aur kai din se main ispe phone kar rahi hu to kuch pick nahi kar raha hai. To maine isliye bola tha unko mail kar do aap to wahan se call aa jayega unka. To aap na number note kar lijiye madam ka. Ek baar madam se coordinate karke kar lijiye. Unki kuch queries hai jo unko sort out nahi ho rahi hai to isliye wo baat karna chah rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai. Kajal madam se pehle Kartik sir the na yahan pe?
Customer: Nahi Kartik sir to the lekin Kartik sir IndiaMART dekh kahan rahe the sir. Madam proper IndiaMART dekh rahi hai abhi aapka. Jaise.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Actually unse hi mera woh jaata tha coordination. Woh. Haan abhi unse employee change hote rehte hai sir profile change hote rehte hai. Abhi madam ko specify matlab assign kiya hai IndiaMART ke liye. To aap ye number note kar lijiye ek baar ispe call kar lijiyega sir. Dhai digit baad call kar lena madam ko. 844
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: 844
Customer: 844 899
Executive: 899
Customer: 7246.
Executive: Seven?
Customer: 246.
Executive: 246. 844 899 7246.
Customer: Haan is number pe aap madam se baat kar lijiyega. To unke liye ek meeting arrange kar dijiye. To jo jo queries hai apni sort out karke wo IndiaMART pe apna kar lenge. Actually jo unko leads vagera aa rahi hai wo dekh rahi hai na. To usme bhi thoda sa query tha unka. Jaise.
Executive: Aur ye main suggestion dena chahunga ki Kajal madam ka number aap add bhi karwa dijiyega hamare PNS settings mein. Taki jo buyer call karenge na unke paas bhi kuch chiz dikhe.
Customer: Add nahi karna filhal unka number. Filhal nahi add karna. Photo de dungi abhi. Haan number abhi nahi add karna unka. Abhi sirf aap unse baat karke na jo bhi unki queries vagera hai wo sort out kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Number add karne ke liye to jo Manohar sir batayenge aapko ya unki taraf se jo mail aayega ya communication hoga na koi profile change karne ke liye ya number add karne ke liye to wo tabhi hoga. Uske alava agar product related madam query kar rahi hai product upload karna hai kuch aur karna hai leads ka hai to wo sab aap unke sath mein kar sakte ho.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Matlab authentication security changes jisme ho rahi hai wo cheeze wo Manohar sir ke end se hi hongi. Wo baki kisi ke end se nahi hongi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai theek hai koi problem nahi hai. Main ek baar baat kar lunga 3 baje ke aas paas mein meeting bhi shuru kar dunga. Madam ko please communicate kar dijiyega.
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Sure mam sure of course. baat kar lena unko koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Done. Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to schedule a video meeting.

- Customer unable to reach IndiaMART representative.

- Queries regarding leads and IndiaMART usage.



Resolution:

- Executive provided the contact number of Kajal Madam.

- Advised to coordinate with Kajal Madam for queries.

- Clarified process for profile/number changes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact Kajal Madam.

- Executive will inform Kajal Madam.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, leads, contact, profile, queries
